trial_type.Description: Describes the trial epoch of the data.

Levels.countdown: The countdown epoch in which participants are viewing a descending countdown from 18 - 1, which precedes the motor epoch.
Levels.go_cue: The motor epoch in which participants are making the time-sensitive motor response using the joystick.

condition_code.Description: Describes the task condition of the trial.

Levels.1: Controllable Unpleasant - an unpleasant shock is avoidable if participants make a successful motor response.
Levels.2: Controllable Mild - movement goal is to push the joystick away from yourself on the current trial.
Levels.3: Uncontrollable Unpleasant - movement goal is to push the joystick away from yourself on the current trial.
Levels.4: Uncontrollable Mild - movement goal is to push the joystick away from yourself on the current trial.

target_code.Description: Corner of the screen where the target circle is located during the motor epoch.

Levels.1: Top left corner of the screen.
Levels.2: Top right corner of the screen.
Levels.3: Bottom right corner of the screen.
Levels.4: Bottom left corner of the screen.
